name: 葛瑞斐
objective:
通過簡短的寫作作業和課堂討論，本課程將幫助培養學生的英語寫作技巧和作文策略。 上學期專注於寫作和學術論證之間的關係，我們將在本學期應用這些技能，因為學生開始研究和寫作他們的高級項目。
Through short writing assignments and class discussion, this course will help develop students’ English writing skills and strategies for composition.  Having focused last semester on the relation between writing and academic arguments, we will apply those skills this semester as students begin the research and writing of their senior projects.
schedule:
Week	1:	 	Intro 

2-4:		Senior Project proposals

5-6:	 	Research I: field of study questions

7-8:		Research II: primary texts

9:		Midterm

10-12:	 	Grammar review

13-14:		Research III: secondary texts 

15-17:		Exercises in Style

18:		Finals week
